entry.title: Today in DeFi - IntentX Perp Dex on Base, Nocturne Privacy Live, JPMorgan Tokenizing Assets with Avalanche, Earn with Idle NFTs, and more...
entry.summary: IntentX Perp Dex on Base IntentX launches an intent-based perp dex with over 180 perpetual markets on Base L2, providing a CEX-like trading experience. Nocturne Privacy Live Privacy protocol Nocturne has deployed its v1 on the Ethereum mainnet, introducing the concept of on-chain private accounts to Ethereum.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Dopex V2 Live, Armada V2 on Solana, LayerZero Launches USDV, LPing Made Simple, and more...
entry.summary: Dopex V2 Live Dopex launches V2 with CLAMM officially available with Yield boosting & optimization for v3 LPs, and American-style options for traders. Armada V2 Solana-based Armada launches V2 SPL Token Staking and DeMUX. SPL is a governance plugin that allows token holders to vote on DAO proposals while also staking their tokens to receive rewards, and DeMUX allows for semi-automated protocol reward distribution.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Butter Finance Cancelled, Real Estate Trading on Solana, Vertex LBA Live, Trading Perps on Solana, and more...
entry.summary: Butter Finance Canceled Butter Fnance announces cancelation for the project as "contributors found the proposed veCAKE system & incentives model to be impractical for a path forward for Butter." Parcl V3 on Solana Solana-based real estate trading protocol

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Raft Exploited for 6.7M, Pika Retiring Token, Ether.fi Launches eETH, RocketPool Announces Houston Upgrade, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Nov 6th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - BlackRock Files for Spot ETH ETF, Flashbots Founder Launches Telegram Bot, Dyson Live on Polygon zkEVM, Quest to Earn, and more...
entry.summary: BlackRock Files for Spot ETH ETF BlackRock has filed a spot ETH ETF (iShares Ethereum Trust ETF) through Nasdaq. The ETF would use Coinbase Custody Trust Company as custodian, according to the filing. It will use the CME CF Ether-Dollar Reference Rate - New York Variant.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Jupiter Launches Perps, Binance Web3 Wallet, Lido Lands on Base, Trade Perps on zkSync, and more...
entry.summary: Jupiter Launches Perps Solana DEX aggregator Jupiter launched an LP-to-trader perpetual exchange, with the available SOL, ETH, and BTC markets. Binance Web3 Wallet Binance launches Web3 Wallet featuring MPC tech. The wallet generates three key shares, each stored in a separate location: the user’s personal cloud storage, their own device, and Binance’s protected servers.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Linea Voyage Live, Flexlend Launches Solana Lending Aggregator, Vertex Launches SL/TP Orders, Automated V3 Liquidity, and more...
entry.summary: Linea Voyage Live Linea L2 launches Defi Voyage in partnership with IntractCampaign. The first week is starting with MetaMask tasks. Flexlend Live on Solana Solana-based Lulo Finance launches Flexlend, a lending aggregator with limit orders. Vertex Stop Loss/Take Profit Orders

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Notional V3 Public Launch, Quickswap Live on Manta, ARB Staking Approved, Points Program, and more...
entry.summary: Notional V3 Public Launch Notional V3 is live publicly on Arbitrum. V3 supports 12 currencies for lending and borrowing, and 9 for leveraged yield strategies. And NOTE incentives are live. Quickswap Live on Manta QuickSwap is live on Manta Pacific with token rewards and incentives for traders and LPs.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Aave V2 Pauses, Lens V2 on Mainnet, Derivio Live on zkSync Era, Valorem V1 Live on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Oct 30th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aragon Association Dissolution, WOOFi Pro Live, Jupiter Launches Token, Fractional NFT Farming, and more...
entry.summary: Aragon Association Dissolution The Aragon Association will dissolve itself, allow holders to redeem their ANT for ETH, and the Aragon project will focus on product development. WOOFi Pro Live Woofi launches WOOFi Pro, an orderbook-based perp dex with omnichain deposits, CEX-like UX, up to 20x leverage, and revenue share.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Onyx Exploited For 2.1M, SEC Charges SafeMoon, Hyperlane Supports Celestia Bridging, On-chain DCA, and more...
entry.summary: Onyx Exploited for $2.1M Lending protocol Onyx was exploited for ~$2.1M due to the same rounding issue behind the 7M Hundred Finance hack. SEC Charges SafeMoon The SEC charges two SafeMoon executives with fraud and unregistered offering of crypto securities. The arrested executives “withdrew crypto assets worth more than $200 million from the project, and misappropriated investor funds for personal use.”

entry.title: Today in DeFi - PancakeSwap Position Manager, Nomic BTC Live on Osmosis & Kujira, WalletConnect Bans Ukraine and Russia, Extra Yield on Staked ETH, and more...
entry.summary: PancakeSwap Position Manager PancakeSwap launches Position Manager on V3, enabling automated LP, gas-free auto-compounding, and protocol & strategy integrations. Nomic BTC Live on Osmosis & Kujira Bitcoin bridge L1 Nomic launches nBTC on Osmosis and Kujira.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Unibot Exploited for 450 ETH, Proposal to Activate ARB Staking, Perennial Trigger Orders, On-chain Dual Investments, and more...
entry.summary: Unibot Exploited for 450 ETH Unibot experienced a token approval exploit and the team has halted the protocol. The exploiter transfers meme coins from users and exchanges them for ETH, so far the exploit size is ~450 ETH. Avalanche Snowtrace Discontinuing

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Arbitrum Orbit Mainnet Ready, IndexCoop cdETI Live, Astrid Exploit, Poolshark Beta-2 Live, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Oct 23th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Polygon POL Live, Kava One-Click Bridging, Swell Rewards stETH Deposits, Wallet Airdrop, Lower Risk Options, and more...
entry.summary: Polygon POL Live on Ethereum Polygon 2.0 token POL contracts are deployed on the Ethereum mainnet. Kava One-Click Bridging Kava launches a one-click bridge solution, enabling $USDT transfers across Kava EVM, Kava IBC, and Injective. Swell Super swETH

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maestro Router Exploit, dydx Chain Live, Astrid Mainnet Live, Stable Yields, Token Buybacks, and more...
entry.summary: Maestro Router Exploit Maestro Router was compromised. The team has identified the exploit and resumed trading, but tokens with pools on certain dexes will be temporarily unavailable. Earlier the team promised that affected users would be fully refunded (~280ETH in total).

entry.title: Today in DeFi - BTC ETF progress, Sushi Cross-chain Swaps Live, DCA with Cowswap, IDO Premining, and more...
entry.summary: BTC ETF Progress Blackrock's iShares Bitcoin Trust has been listed on the DTCC (Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation, which clears NASDAQ trades). The ticker will be $IBTC. Blackrock is also looking to seed the ETF, this usually happens when ETFs are preparing to launch.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Yearn veYFI Live, Notional v3 Public Soon, 1inch Considers Ladder Buying ETH, AAVE AURA Token Swap, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Oct 16th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Token Swaps on Aave, IndexCoop Works with eToro, Bitcoin Spot ETFs In Review, Liquidation-free Loans, and more...
entry.summary: Aave Token Swap Aave now allows traders to swap tokens directly on the website. IndexCoop x eToro eToro partners with IndexCoop to launch Web3 Smart Portfolio. The portfolio – ‘Index-Coop’ – will cover four key sectors: Bitcoin, Ethereum, DeFi, and the Metaverse.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Trade Credit Spreads, Angle Gets Euro On-ramp, Polkadot Mass Layoffs, Volatility Trading Made Easy, and more...
entry.summary: Rysk Atomic Credit Spreads Rysk launches Atomic Credit Spreads, an options strategy involving selling and buying options contracts with 10x capital efficiency. Angle x Unblock Angle protocol partners with Unblock, enabling users to buy and sell agEUR (Euro-pegged stablecoin) with fiat using bank transfers.
